content:
Everyone in my clash just now got 0% because the statement is so confusing.

The first step is not clear:
- Starting with : ["0", "1"]

Why? Then why for n = 1 do you start with ["0"] instead?

It took me looking through the test cases to understand what was actually happening, because the statement was so unclear.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: it's not very difficult and not that easy, the best ratio for clash of code

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Like @phanhuykhangIl said, it may be a bit complicated for new coder, but can definitly be done or make them engage in a good research. It can be done pretty quicly otherwise

Fun clash. I would precise that in "but only the first 1000 characters", spaces are counted (as opposed to the first 1000 zeros and ones).

- "Concatenante the two list" -> "two lists"
- "Gray Code", "Result of a gray code", "the range of the Gray code" -> decide on a capitalization and use the same for everything (including the stub).

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I accept, but this problem has a bit hard for new coder. Everyone can follow and learn about https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/generate-n-bit-gray-codes/
This doesn't look possible in reverse.

Goal
* Please change "," to "." at the end of the middle paragraph.

* Please use N = 2 as an example and explain how the list is generated.

Output / Cases
* Please do not use an output format (i.e. the list format) which can be directly generated for a particular programming language (Python in this case). This is very unfavourable to players of other programming languages.

Please change the output format to
* either one element per line
* or elements separated by a space

Constraints
* Please format "N" as a [[variable]].

* Please increase 6 to 10 or 100.

Cases
* Tests and validators should be different. Please change the cases so that each pair of test and validator cover N of a similar magnitude.

Thanks.

Ok, i've finally done all the change but i can't go over N = 6, because the output is bigger than 1000 char, so i thought about combine all number or smt, but every combinaison give a way more simple answer, so i have to keep it from 1 to 6
Thank you, the changes have been made

Understood, but it is still an issue:

* The input of two tests is 5.

* The input of two validators is 6.

Please swap the cases.

And optionally, if you want to have cases of greater N, you may request the player to output the first 1000 characters only for N ≥ 7.

Thanks.
Understood, changed have been made, it now go up to N = 16, and no validator have the same value

That looks ok.

Output
* Please change "chars" to "characters".

Constraints
* Please change the upper limit.

Thanks.
